summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite that verifies the behavior of the supervised fine‑tuning trainer and its associated components, covering data collation, parameter‑efficient fine‑tuning integration, sequence packing, endless training loops, handling of multiple evaluation datasets, and compatibility with various model and datatype configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and flexibility of the supervised fine‑tuning pipeline for language and multimodal models, enabling stable product releases and research experiments that depend on accurate training, evaluation, and PEFT support.
